rules_text:
Flying, haste, lifelink
When Mima dies, instead exile it.
{2}{B}{B}, Pay 4 life, Discard a card: Return Mima from exile to the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text: [i]“I've never been one to let a little sealing-away stop me for long. Come, then- show me if you've improved at all since last we met!”[/i]
notes:
Cut lifelink?
Higher cost to recur?
